mainContent.content: Founded by ThoughtWorks Alumni - Pioneers of Agile methodology of software development
Get hands-on Product Development experience with an emphasis on the highest coding standards
An opportunity to work for high-growth Tech Startups with potential for exponential growth

offeringContent.title: What we offer ?
offeringContent.titleContent: We have mutiple offerings to upskill candidates and we are different from other players

Emerging Startups: Opportunity to get placed directly in the startup
Community: Become Part of a community of developers
Support in overall growth and aspects of Career
Others: Learn best practises in development and testing
